attributes.action: be more accountable to the ordinary man in the street by meeting on a regular quarterly basis via a television programme in order to face questions about how the current government is treating the people who elected them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This question session is urgently needed so that we the electorate,the people of this once great country,can air our views so that we know they will be heard. Whereas now we cannot get through to let the PM know how WE feel about day to day life in this country,e.g. crippling ever increasing taxes such as inheritance tax,income tax etc.etc.etc.and maddening annoyances like daily rises in fuel costs and the crazy situation where a huge slice of the price is actually fuel duty and VAT! More actual DEMOCRACY is required!  Governments are voted in and then spiral out of control.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
